text: == Events == === By place === ==== Roman Empire ==== * Emperor Constantius II goes to his territory in the East. Persia under king Shapur II is attacking Mesopotamia. For the next 11 years the two powers battle with no real winner. === By topic === ==== Religion ==== * Pope Julius I gives refuge at Rome to Athanasius. * Eusebius of Nicomedia is made bishop of Constantinople. Another Arian becomes bishop of Alexandria. == Births == * Aurelius Ambrosius, bishop of Milan (approximate date) * He Fani, empress of the Jin Dynasty (d. 404) * Shi Shi, emperor of the Jie state Later Zhao (d. 349) == Deaths == * Abaye, Babylonian amora * Eusebius of Caesarea, bishop and first church historian (approximate date) * Shemon Bar Sabbae, bishop of Seleucia-Ctesiphon * Wang Dao, statesman of the Jin Dynasty (b. 276)
